hero.headline: SKYLAR SRL
hero.support: Custom Distribution & Sales Platforms · 3-Hour Website Launch · Multilingual Markets
hero.copy: Cristiana Marzano and Peter Cowling design, source, and launch commerce experiences that scale between China, Italy, and multilingual markets.
services.heading: Products & Platforms (core business)
services.intro: Product design, China sourcing, and fast multilingual launches backed by distribution and sales platforms.
services.list.distribution: Custom distribution & sales platforms for multilingual markets.
services.list.platform: 3-hour website launch with the Skylar platform.
products.heading: Products & Platforms
products.intro: Skylar is the team behind product strategy, sourcing, and the proprietary platform that keeps multilingual launches fast.
products.sections.design.title: Product Design & China Sourcing
products.sections.design.body: Cristiana Marzano choreographs new collections—from ideation through tooling—to Chinese suppliers who deliver craftsmanship, compliance, and traceability.
products.sections.distribution.title: Custom Distribution & Sales Platforms
products.sections.distribution.body: Peter Cowling orchestrates channels, distributors, and multilingual sales platforms for D2C, wholesale, and marketplace partners.
products.sections.platform.title: 3-Hour Website Launch
products.sections.platform.body: Skylar’s platform goes live in under three hours with brand styling, automated storefronts, and translation-ready content.
products.sections.markets.title: Multilingual Markets
products.sections.markets.body: Localized payments, logistics, and support keep teams nimble in Italian, English, Chinese, and more.
realEstate.heading: Hostel Brikette
realEstate.intro: Skylar’s hospitality expression on the Amalfi Coast.
realEstate.sections.location.title: Location
realEstate.sections.location.body: Perched on the Positano cliffs with terraces overlooking the Tyrrhenian Sea, the hostel is minutes from the ferry pier.
realEstate.sections.guests.title: Guests & rooms
realEstate.sections.guests.body: Dorms and private suites that balance affordability with design—ideal for explorers, creators, and remote teams.
realEstate.sections.experience.title: Experience
realEstate.sections.experience.body: A social terrace and bar, curated playlists, and concierge tips for Amalfi, Ravello, Sorrento, Capri, and beyond.
realEstate.note: Bookings, experiences, and availability are handled by the hostel site.
